p: The relative mRNA expression of elovl6 in the liver of large yellow croaker was remarkably affected by dietary fatty acids ( p < 0.05). The expression of the elovl6 gene in the liver of large yellow croaker fed the diets with soybean oil (SO), linseed oil (LO), or palm oil (PO) were significantly higher than that in croaker fed the diet with fish oil (FO) ( p < 0.05), and the highest expression of elovl6 was observed in PO group ( Figure 5).
